title: I dreamed that I married someone I loved in a dream

preview.html: I dreamed that I married someone I loved in a dream. Seeing a wedding has many meanings, so we learn in the following lines what it means to see a dream that I married someone I love in a dream.. I dreamed that I married someone I love in a dream. I dreamed that I married someone I love in a dream can be evidence of success and achieving what you want, and God knows best. Likewise, seeing marriage to your lover and becoming pregnant may translate into an imminent marriage, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees that her parents do not approve of her marrying someone she loves, this may be a sign that she You will not succeed or achieve goals, and God knows the unseen. Likewise, if a married woman sees herself walking on air in a dream, this may be a sign of The money she earns, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees herself walking on the air in a dream, this may represent the power she gains, and God knows all that we did not see. I dreamed that I expelled my mother. If an unmarried girl sees that she She was expelled from her home in a dream, as this may be evidence that she is going through a period of trouble and difficulties, and God is Great and All-Knowing. If a married woman sees Kurds from school in a dream, this may indicate anxiety, and God knows the unseen. I dreamed that my mother gave birth to a boy in a dream. I dreamed that my mother gave birth to a boy in a dream, it could be a sign of nourishment, and God is All-Knowing. In the event that the dreamer sees my mother giving birth to a male child In a dream, this may indicate goodness and sustenance, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If an unmarried girl sees her mother giving birth to a male child, this could be a sign On pride and pride, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. However, the dream interpretation of a non-pregnant mother giving birth to a male child in a dream could be a sign of trouble, and God knows all that is not seen. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing Surat Al-Anbiya in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Anbiya in a dream by Ibn Shirin. The great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin says that seeing reading Surat Al-Anbiya in a dream indicates the expectation of a new baby for a married man, and God knows best. Likewise, if a married man sees in a dream that he is reading Surat Al-Anbiya, this indicates the disappearance of her worries and the improvement of his conditions and the conditions of his family. The scholar Ibn Shirin mentioned that seeing Surat Al-Anbiya in a dream indicates the disappearance of worries and the inclination toward good deeds in this world. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Anbiya in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees herself reading Surat Al-Anbiya in a dream, this means that her affairs will be facilitated and success will be brought. Also, seeing Surat Al-Anbiya in a dream indicates the collapse of problems and worries and a good, close marriage for an unmarried girl with her life partner. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is reading Surat Al-Anbiya, this indicates the different things that she will do in her next life. Seeing Surat Al-Anbiya in suspension. On the wall in a dream may indicate the collapse of disputes, success and excellence in studies and higher affairs. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Anbiya in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees herself reading Surat Al-Anbiya in a dream, this indicates brilliant success and academic excellence in the lives of her children. Also, seeing Surat Al-Anbiya Memorizing it repeatedly in a dream indicates her growth at home, her faith in God Almighty, and her imminent pregnancy. Also, this vision may express the collapse of differences between her and her husband, repentance to God Almighty, and facilitating her affairs. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Anbiya in a dream about a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is reading Surah The Prophets, this indicates the disappearance of sins and worries and the ease of childbirth. Likewise, seeing Surat Al-Anbiya’ repeated in a dream indicates her faith in God Almighty, her good intentions, and her worship of Him, and God knows best. Also, seeing a pregnant woman reading Surat Al-Anbiya’ in a dream indicates stability and comfortable living, as it indicates To facilitate her birth. Interpretation of seeing Surat Al-Anbiya in a dream for a man: If a person sees in a dream that he is reading Surat Al-Anbiya, this means that he has recovered from the severe illness from which he was suffering. Also, seeing Surat Al-Anbiya in a dream indicates self-development in a person’s life and joining a new job. And God knows best. Seeing Surat Al-Anbiya in a man’s dream indicates sustenance and that his wife will give birth to good offspring, and God knows best. Also, seeing Surat Al-Anbiya hanging in the air indicates that the goal has been achieved and the desires that one seeks to fulfill. Interpretation of a dream about reading a verse, people will come closer to their account. Interpretation Seeing a verse that brings people closer to their reckoning in a dream is good news and happiness that will come to the dreamer, God willing. The interpretation of a dream about hearing a verse that brings people closer to their reckoning shows, from afar, the dreamer of disobedience and transgressions, his repentance, and his closeness to God Almighty. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below. A team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of seeing the soul in a dream, its exit from the body and its return

preview.html: We are talking about the interpretation of seeing a soul in a dream. Seeing a spirit in a dream means comfort, comfort, kindness, and freeing the viewer from his worries and problems in his life. If a person sees his soul leaving his body, this is a loss of money, but if he sees his soul leaving with its testimony, this is good news of a good ending. Interpretation of seeing the soul in a dream There are different interpretations of the dream of the soul, the interpretation of seeing the soul in a dream, some are good and some are bad. We present some of these interpretations, which are: Taking a soul indicates distress, fatigue, and many problems and worries. As for seeing a white soul in a dream, it means happiness, joy, comfort, and tranquility. Whoever sees that his soul ascended to heaven and did not die, he ascended to a position and reached a great position, only after... Fatigue and hardship. As for the evil spirit, it is evil and harmful to the dreamer, and escaping from evil spirits in a dream indicates his liberation from evil and wickedness. The spirit of a child in a dream is evidence of happiness and joy, but seeing the spirit of a strange child appearing indicates the worries and difficulties of life. If the child sees his spirit leaving Then it came back again so it is. Good news of the end of pain, anxiety and sorrow. Seeing the dead in a dream means that this person remembers the dead a lot. Seeing the souls of the dead indicates asceticism in this world and working for victory in the afterlife. But if a person feels fear when he sees the spirit of the dead, then he is weak in faith. Interpretation The souls in the house are filled with a large number of children. Seeing the souls in the street means a large number of friends and acquaintances. As for seeing the souls in the cemetery, it shows that the dreamer is going through distress and illusion. Seeing the angel of death holding the dreamer’s soul indicates that he has committed a great sin and that he must approach. From God and staying away from sins. If one sees that the angel of death takes the soul of someone he knows, this indicates the corruption of that person’s religion. Interpretation of the dream of the soul leaving the body and returning. With regard to seeing the interpretation of the dream of the soul leaving the body and then returning again, we find that it is good news. That the condition of the dreamer or the state of the owner of the soul has changed in this dream. And when he saw the dead person, his soul left and then returned again, this shows a son or a good deed calling to him and helping him collect good deeds in this world despite the interruption of his work in this world. God knows best. What is the interpretation of a dream about a contraction of the soul? When you see in a dream a contraction of the soul. You are still suffering from some sins and transgressions that need to be repented, so face the Qiblah and raise your hands to God, asking Him for forgiveness for this sin. It can refer to another connotation, which is the condition of the dreamer who loves helping and assisting those around him, but always complains of problems and pressures. Interpretation of the vision The soul flying in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the soul in a dream. Seeing the soul flying is good dreams and has many meanings, such as: Seeing the soul flying means breaking a prisoner and achieving freedom. Seeing the soul of a dead person you know flying is hearing good news about the family of the deceased, but seeing the soul of a stranger flying is The happiness that the dreamer obtains. Seeing the white spirit flying over many of the good deeds and good deeds that the dreamer does. If he sees himself near

title: Interpretation of a dream about swimming in rainwater

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about swimming in rainwater in a dream Here we will learn about one of the dreams that many people see and want to know all the interpretations and connotations of this vision, and whether they are good or bad dreams, so let us discuss them in detail today. Interpretation of a dream about swimming in rainwater in a dream If a person sees that he is swimming in rainwater, this is a sign of fulfilling desires and dreams for that period. Seeing yourself swimming in rainwater in a dream is a sign of repentance from sins and disobedience at that time. The dream of swimming in rainwater in a dream is a sign that you are moving away from falsehood and heading to the right path. When a person sees in a dream that he is swimming in rainwater, this is a sign of getting rid of the negative things he has suffered from and new changes in his life. Interpretation of a dream about diving underwater in a dream Seeing an unmarried girl drowning underwater in a dream indicates the fulfillment of desires and dreams at that time. When a person sees that he is diving underwater in a dream, this is a sign of achieving goals and aspirations for the coming days. Seeing diving underwater in a dream indicates a feeling of happiness and joy during this time. Seeing someone diving underwater in a dream indicates the end of the troubles and sorrows he has suffered in the past days. Interpretation Dream of diving in mud in a dream Whoever dreams that he is diving in mud is a sign of a serious illness that has afflicted him at that time. Seeing a patient diving in mud in a dream is a sign of the tension and sadness that will affect him in the coming period. When a man dreams that he is diving in mud, this is a sign of the problems and fears he suffers from and may indicate his imprisonment. Dreaming of swimming in mud and mud in a dream is evidence of the severe sadness that he will suffer from for long periods of time. Interpretation of a dream of breathing underwater in a dream Anyone who dreams that he is submerged under water and breathing is a sign of his confidence at that time. Dreaming of breathing underwater means that the dreamer relies on himself and not on others. Interpretation of seeing diving underwater and breathing is a sign of a very good psychological state for the visionary. When a person sees that he is breathing underwater in a dream, this is an indication of the positive changes that will occur in his life in the coming period. Interpretation of a dream of diving in the sea in a dream Seeing diving in the sea in a dream is a sign of fear of something in reality. Dreaming of a man diving in the sea and not being afraid is a sign of the strength of the personality of the dreamer. Seeing diving in the sea with waves indicates repentance from sins and transgressions At that time. Seeing someone diving into the sea in a dream is a sign of some illness and severe pain. Interpretation of a dream about diving into a pool in a dream Anyone who dreams of diving into a pool is a sign of relief from anxiety and the end of crises. Seeing someone diving into a pool in a dream is a sign of the release of a prisoner from his relatives or the recovery of a sick person. Seeing someone swimming in a swimming pool in a dream is a sign of imminent travel. Interpretation of seeing washing with pool water in a dream is a sign of good things that will come

When a person sees that he is breathing underwater in a dream, this is an indication of positive changes That will happen in his life in the coming period. Interpretation of a dream about diving in the sea in a dream: Seeing diving in the sea in a dream is a sign of fear of something in reality. Dreaming of a man diving in the sea and not being afraid is a sign of the strength of the character of the dreamer. Seeing diving in the sea With waves indicates repentance for sins and transgressions at that time. Seeing someone diving in the sea in a dream is a sign of some illness and severe pain. Interpretation of a dream about diving in a pool in a dream. Anyone who dreams of diving in a pool is a sign of relief from anxiety and the end of crises. Seeing someone Diving into a pool in a dream is a sign of the release of a prisoner from his relatives or the recovery of a sick person. Seeing someone swimming in a pool in a dream is a sign of imminent travel. Interpretation of seeing washing with pool water in a dream is a sign of good things that will come

title: Interpretation of the dream of a chick for single, married and pregnant women according to Ibn Sirin in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a chick for a single, married and pregnant woman by Ibn Sirin in detail, a chick is a small chicken, and many call it a chick, which is a flightless bird that the hen lays in the egg, then stands still on it for three weeks, and the hen's eggs begin to hatch one by one, the chick comes with its body covered with a very soft material called feathers, and these feathers remain for two months, after which they fall and the chicken's wings grow from them and the chicks feed on insects, small worms and plants, and after six months, these chicks become able to lay eggs and seeing chicks in reality is one of the beautiful things, and many would like to get an interpretation of a dream about a chick in detail for a single, married and pregnant woman by Ibn Sirin, and below is all the information revolving around the topic of answering this. Interpretation of a dream about a yellow chick There are two colors for chicks, one of which is yellow chicks and white, and many people are tempted by yellow chicks, and seeing them in reality is one of the things that makes people very happy, and below is all the information about the answer to the interpretation of a dream about a yellow chick: The dream about a yellow chick symbolizes that it is one of the pleasant dreams Which is interpreted as an expression of the abundant good that the dreamer will obtain in the coming period of his life, God willing. And the man who works in trade and sees in a dream that there are many yellow chicks walking in his place of trade, this dream is interpreted as one of the pleasant dreams that brings the skin to expand the dreamer's trade, and he gets a lot of money in the coming period of his life. And whoever sees a dead yellow chick in his dream, this dream is one of the unpleasant dreams, indicating many sorrows and great worries that will befall the dreamer in the coming days. And the sick yellow sauce for the dreamer, in which there is a patient close to his life, represents the exacerbation of the disease in the coming days for him, and it may indicate the death of the patient, God bless him. And the Most High is the Most High and the Most Knowing. And whoever sees in a dream that many chicks are roaming around him, and the dreamer gets married, then this dream is interpreted as an announcement of the news of his wife's pregnancy in the coming period, God willing. And chicks in a dream in general indicate the abundance of food and goodness that the dreamer will acquire, God willing, the Blessed and Most High. See also the interpretation of a dream of a lot of money for a single woman and a married woman in a dream by Ibn Sirin Interpretation of a dream of a yellow chick for a single woman The little yellow chick has a very innocent face, and this is what makes it loved by many, and many people love to get it and raise it in their home, and for this reason many people want to get all the information on the subject of the answer in yellow. Interpretation of a dream of a chick for singles, and the following is all the information about it: The girl who dreams that a chicken egg hatched and a small chick came out. This dream indicates the abundance of kindness and abundance of sustenance for the dreamer, and some scholars saw in it an indication of the young woman's progress in her engagement. Whoever suffers from many worries and saw the chick

title: Interpretation of seeing my daughter in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing my daughter In a dream or a dream via the Vision roy2a.com website, seeing young girls causes a feeling of happiness and joy because of their kindness, gentleness, purity of their soul, and purity of their emotions. In the vision and depending on the state of insight and his circumstances, and whether he is a single man or woman, married or pregnant, and today through the vision website we will discuss the interpretation of seeing a daughter in a dream in detail, based on the opinion of superior interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is it? Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing my daughter in a dream: Seeing children in general in a dream indicates goodness, many blessings, and the provision of children. Seeing a daughter in a dream indicates what God gives the pioneer and what gives him great happiness. Seeing a beautiful and good daughter in Paradise indicates what the dreamer will get from Permissible money is one of the good things and pleasures of the world. Seeing an ugly daughter with dirty clothes in a dream indicates that the dreamer will fall into crises and tribulations and will be afflicted with worry and sadness. Seeing a young girl crying in a dream means hearing bad news or a close death for the dreamer, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of seeing a beautiful child With blue eyes in a dream What is Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of seeing my daughter in a dream: Seeing a daughter in a dream It indicates the joy, happiness, and abundant food that the dreamer will have in his next life. Seeing a weak daughter in a dream It indicates great problems and pressures to which the dreamer is exposed. Seeing an ugly daughter in a dream Dreams: A harbinger of humanity that will plague the fortuneteller in the coming period. See also: Interpretation of seeing a girl cutting her hair in a dream. Interpretation of my daughter seeing a married woman in a dream: Seeing a married girl with a beautiful appearance in a dream. It indicates the good offspring she will have in her life and it may be an indication that she will soon become pregnant. Seeing a married girl with a beautiful appearance in a dream indicates the news that she will hear soon that will cause great joy in her home. Seeing a married girl with a beautiful appearance in a dream indicates the success that you will achieve in your field of work or the money that you will get soon. See also: Interpretation of seeing a girl with a mustache in a dream Dream Interpretation of seeing my daughter in a dream for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant girl with a beautiful appearance in a dream indicates that she will give birth easily and safely and without facing problems or problems during the birth process. Seeing a pregnant girl with a beautiful appearance in a dream announces that she will give birth to her baby in good health, God willing. Seeing a pregnant girl in a dream may It indicates that she will give birth to a son, and God knows best. See also: The interpretation of a pregnant woman seeing a daughter. What is the interpretation of a man seeing my daughter in a dream: A man seeing a beautiful daughter in a dream indicates the success he will achieve and what he will gain in the coming period. A man seeing a beautiful daughter in a dream can indicate a promotion And a new job at work. A man sees a beautiful daughter in a dream. This indicates that God will give him good children and grant him money and blessings in his life. Seeing a man, a merchant, or a farmer, a young girl in a dream indicates that he will suffer losses in the trade or agriculture in which he works. What is the interpretation of a vision?

title: Interpretation of hair in a dream, interpretation of dyeing hair in a dream, and interpretation of cutting hair in a dream

preview.html: Seeing hair in a dreamHair is an integral part of the body, whether it is a man or a woman. Sometimes a woman sees in her dream that her hair is long and in another dream her hair is short and so does the man, so there are many dreams that contain hair that she sees, so an accurate interpretation is required for each case so that the dreamer benefits and knows well the interpretation of what he saw.Seeing hair in a dreamSeeing beautiful hair on A head in a dream means that the dreamer will gain honor and respect. Long and abundant hair indicates the dreamer’s abundance of money and food. A woman who sees in her dream that she is braiding her hair indicates that she only spends money where it belongs. Removing body hair and removing it is evidence of freedom from worries. And problems. Tying hair in a dream is evidence of the complexity of the concerns and problems that the dreamer faces and the difficulty of solving them. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is untying the knots in her hair and smoothing her hair gently and gently, this means that this girl is strong and can solve her problems without anyone’s help. Hair A thick stomach in a man’s dream is evidence of abundant livelihood and many victories that will be his portion in the coming days, but if a girl sees thick hair in the abdominal area, this means that she will fall into a major disaster that will continue with her for a long time. Al-Nabulsi believes that seeing hair in a dream is A long life and many good things that the dreamer will enjoy soon. If a married woman sees that her hair is long and uncovered, this indicates the death of her husband and her great sadness for him. Seeing a rich dreamer shaving his hair in a dream means losing a lot of money from his wealth, but seeing a poor dreamer shaving his hair, It means that he will pay off all his debts. Cutting hair in a dream When a married woman sees in her dream that her hair is cut without a machine cutting it, this is a sign that she will divorce her husband. If a married woman sees in her dream that the front part of her hair has been cut, this means that she has She is barren because God did not command her to give birth to children. When the dreamer sees that he was in a battle with his enemies that ended with his hair being cut, this is evidence that the enemies will triumph over him. Interpretation of dyeing hair in a dream Are you confused about your affairs and do not find an explanation that reassures you? Search on Google for the Egyptian dream interpretation website. Dyeing dark hair in a dream is a good vision, especially in black and brown. If a woman sees that she has dyed her hair black, this means that she will live a lot in the near future. But if she sees that she has dyed her hair brown, this indicates that she will achieve a specific goal that she has been planning for years. An unmarried woman dyeing her hair red is evidence of increasing her livelihood and achieving her desired ambitions. Seeing a married woman dyeing her hair gold in a dream indicates love for her husband. For her and his generous spending on her. But if an unmarried woman sees that she has dyed her hair red, this means that she will get married soon. When a single woman sees that he is dyeing his hair a dark black color, this indicates that his life has changed and changed for the better for him. If a married woman sees

title: Learn about the interpretation of a dream about fried fish from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing fried fish in a dreamFried fish in a dream is one of the visions that many men or women have. The interpretation of these visions varies according to the situation in which the person who sees these fish is, and it also differs between the one who sees them, whether he is a man or a woman. Fried fish in a dreamFried fish in a dream and its interpretation According to Ibn Sirin: Whoever sees this type of fish in his dream, this is evidence that he will obtain many goods, whether abundant food or spoils, whether it is a new baby or its arrival. Good health or a good husband or wife. For a man who sees fried fish in a dream, this means that he will receive a sum of money in the form of an inheritance from a relative that will change many things in his material life. If one sees fried fish in his dream, this is evidence that he will gain Great wealth. Interpretation of a dream about fried fish. A wish. The dreamer was praying to his Lord to fulfill it, and he would quickly answer his prayer. If this desire is to complete the marriage, then God will rejoice his heart by completing it as quickly as possible, without patience and hardships. Seeing fried fish in a dream could indicate marital infidelity. God forbid, especially if a married man sees in a dream that another man is eating the same fried fish from which the dreamer ate, then this is a sign that his wife is not a good woman and her behavior needs to be corrected. Ibn Sirin said: If the fried fish was delicious and the dreamer ate from it even Satiated, vision deteriorated. Good luck, may God grant you success. There is no doubt that this good luck will include all aspects of professional, academic, emotional and social life. Perhaps the dreamer who eats fried fish in a dream will leave his country soon and God will give him a job outside his country and earn a lot of money from it. Sometimes the dreamer who sees This scene is in order to complete his studies and obtain a bachelor’s degree or various master’s degrees, and this indicates the difficulties that he will face during this trip and therefore he will have to retract his decision to leave after seeing that dream (which is eating dry or dry fried fish in the vision). Interpretation of a dream about eating fish Fried A divorced woman who can see fried fish in a dream is evidence that her life will be much better than it is now and that in the coming period she will live a happy and complete life and will reach a better social level than it is now. If someone is seen giving a group of these fish to someone Another, on the other hand, this expresses some material assistance that you provide to people in need. As for the woman whose husband died, and she saw this vision of fried fish, this indicates that she will receive kindness and a broad and easy diet soon, which will make her psychological state much better than it is, In addition to her social status. . Case. But when we talk about fried fish in a dream for a single girl, we find that it indicates that she will be able to achieve the various goals that she seeks to the fullest. At other times, this vision for an unmarried girl is an indication that God will give her a husband

title: Interpretation of a dream about gold worn by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi in a dream in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of gold that he was wearing in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi in detail. Seeing gold in a dream is one of the most important visions and dreams that anyone can have. It is also important to know that gold is one of the most expensive and valuable jewelry that exists and is purchased, and is characterized by an attractive luster and enchanting beauty, but this may not be the case with regard to the interpretation of seeing gold in a dream, and here we can put the interpretation of a dream about gold in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi in detail.Interpretation Seeing gold in a dream Seeing gold in a dream is not good in general, this vision carries many interpretations that may not be good, and here we can put the interpretation of gold in a dream in general, which is as follows: When you get an ingot of gold, this indicates that it will fall on The dreamer and anger will fall on him. Also, seeing gold in a dream indicates something unpleasant, and the biography of this person in people’s languages. And when he sees an intact dinar, it appears that he sees the face of the king and returns safely. And if the hands are of gold, then this evil will be found in them. And when you use golden utensils in a dream, this indicates that you have committed Sins: Interpretation of a dream about gold according to Ibn Sirin. When you see gold in a dream, it indicates different things and signs. Ibn Sirin interpreted seeing gold in a dream, and here we present what Ibn Sirin interpreted and what he put it. The interpretation varies depending on the details and the condition of the appearance of gold in the dream, and it is as follows: Seeing gold in a dream indicates many unpleasant things. Also, according to Ibn Shirin, seeing gold in a dream indicates On distress, distress, and damage to money. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a motorcycle in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about gold in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Seeing gold in a dream from Al-Nabulsi will be considered one of the most important visions that a person can see. It is also necessary to know that the interpretation varies depending on the details of the dream, and here we can put an interpretation of a dream about gold. In a dream by Al-Nabulsi, it reads as follows: Al-Nabulsi mentioned in a dream the interpretation of gold in a dream that it indicates joys and power. Al-Nabulsi interpreted seeing gold as a sign of marriage. Al-Nabulsi also interpreted the dream of gold in a dream as a relief from worries and many good deeds. A lot of gold in a dream. The appearance of gold in a dream from Matters interpreted by scholars, and the interpretation of gold in a dream may differ between the dreamer’s condition and the details of the dream. We put here the most important interpretations that have been developed for seeing a lot of gold in a dream: Gold shows a lot of wealth and earning halal money in general. Also, seeing a lot of gold in a dream for a married woman means that she will move to a new home and that her financial situation will turn into value in the coming periods. What What this vision indicates is a brilliant success and portends a distinguished future and the attainment of a prominent position. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a raging brown horse in a dream according to Nablus. A gold necklace in a dream. When you see a golden necklace in a dream, this vision shows many important issues, and it is also necessary to know that seeing a golden necklace in a dream He appears
